biotools.summary: Web server for searching for distant homologs or similar alignment in domain databases. Results may be provided as either multiple sequence alignments or aligned hidden Markov models. An alignment editor allows for user editing of output alignments.

bioschemas.name: webPRC
bioschemas.summary: Web server for searching for distant homologs or similar alignment in domain databases. Results may be provided as either multiple sequence alignments or aligned hidden Markov models. An alignment editor allows for user editing of output alignments.
